title: What are the signs that Allah has accepted our fast? assimalhakeem JAL
transcript: from Indonesia what are the signs that Allah has accepted our I don't know you just fast and hope for the best there are no signs or the moon coming in full or werewolves coming in uh attacking people we don't have to have signs the signs of Allah accepting our forms of worship would usually be that Allah is making us do more Good Deeds stay on the right track and stay away from sins we have expansion of our chest we have tranquility and content this is a sign but there isn't anything like people think that the Gates of Heaven would open and something would descend no
